definition: for a particular person, occasion, purpose/focused on one thing/special/expert/particular (to sth)/concentrated/specialized

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Chinese medicine experts developed a way to treat amnesia using marine materials.
sentences.chinese: 中国医学专家研制出用海洋物质治疗遗忘症的方法。

sentences.english: Biologists and medical scientists are finding ways to fight the superbugs.
sentences.chinese: 生物学家和医学专家正找寻对付超级病菌的方法。

sentences.english: But medical experts caution against the belief that it is a surefire cure.
sentences.chinese: 但医学专家警告人们不要相信这种药物肯定有效。

sentences.english: Most medical experts recommend obtaining such a test every six months.
sentences.chinese: 大多数医学专家推荐没六个月做一次检测。

sentences.english: Medical experts set the device to provide a small amount of energy every few minutes.
sentences.chinese: 医学专家设置的设备提供的能源量小每隔几分钟。

definition: medical doctor/physician who works primarily by administering drugs, as opposed to surgeon 外科醫生|外科医生[wai4 ke1 yi1 sheng1]
consultation (medical)/to meet for diagnosis/(by extension) consultation of different specialists

pinyin: zheng3 xing2 wai4 ke1 yi1 sheng1
